posts.post_content:
CARD IS SOLD!!!!
I only picked this up about 4 weeks ago for my HOF portrait collection, but have since upgraded so this one is available. 
Letting it go for exactly what I got into it. Centering, & image quality are superior on this one. 
Please email me if interested. Thanks all,  Tony
